description:
The CDL MiniTilt is a surface or subsea Pitch and Roll sensor for use in the offshore survey industry. It provides an accuracy of 0.05 degrees in both axes over the full 360 degree range. The unit can be provided in a surface or subsea (3000 m or 6000 m rated) package or can be supplied in an accurately machined mounting frame for OEM applications.

The MiniTilt is highly compatible with existing Pitch and Roll sensors. It uses a bank of 6 internal option switches to provide a total of 32 different output data formats.

The zero point can be factory set to any position. This allows for unusual mounting arrangements where the MiniTilt can be placed horizontally rather than vertically. The zero point can be set to any mark on the 360-degree angle so even offset mounting arrangements can be handled.
